screensaver.name: munch
screensaver._description:
DATAI 2 ADDB 1,2 ROTC 2,-22 XOR 1,2 JRST .-4
As reported by HAKMEM, in 1962, Jackson Wright wrote the above PDP-1 code. That code still lives on here, some 46 years later. The number of lines of enclosing code has increased substantially, however.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HAKMEM http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Munching_square
Written by Jackson Wright and Tim Showalter; 1997.
